entry.title: Fixed Installment plan for Heavy Equipment OTC Process along with Down payment advance.
entry.content:
Our Business Requirement is similar to what is explained by SAP on help portal regarding Installment plan find the below link.

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_ON-PREMISE/7b24a64d9d0941bda1afa753263d9e39/b470b6535fe6b74ce10000000a174cb4.html

Installment Plan | SAP Help Portal

While configuring the system I am coming across few challenges and need an expert opinion to configure it in a proper way.

 

Business Scenario:

Fixed Installment plan for Heavy Equipment OTC Process along with Down payment advance.

While buying a Heavy Equipment Customer Signs a Deal worth of SAR 1,000,000 with 30 % Percent as a down payment and the remaining amount should be paid within a 12 Month equal installment plan.

The Break down should be as below:

Down payment: SAR 300,000

Credit amount: SAR 700,000

Monthly installments: SAR 58,333 of 12 months

Down payment:

  • Down Payment Condition Type (AZFP) is Added in Pricing Procedure along with statistical Check.
  • User will provide the Down payment condition type manually in sales order header 300000
  • Payment Terms configured with 12 months of equal installments.

 

Sales Order Creation:

Order Value: SAR 1,000,000 (PR00) Price Including Down Payment – Heavy Equipment Price is determined through Condition Record. Down payment value 300,000 is included in PR00.

Down payment: SAR 300,000 (AZFP) Statistical Condition No Impact on Net Value (Condition Entered Manually by user at header level).

Payment Terms: Z12M (12 Months Fixed Installment) – User will maintain Payment Terms Z12M at header level manually.

Challenge:

  • System is calculating the 12 Months installments based on the Order Net Value which is 1,000,000 based on the payment terms. (1,000,000/12 = 83333.3).
  • The System should consider value 7,00,000 for 12 months equal installment by considering an advance:

Order Value (1,000,000)

Advance (3,00,000)  

12 Months Installment should be on 7,00,000 (Order Value – Advance)

 

  • Currently the calculation of payment terms installments is happening on 1,000,000 expectation is it should be on 7,00,000.
  • Business is Maintain the PR00 value inclusive of Down payment.

 

 

 

Can you please let me know a possible approach to address this requirement.

entry.title: ECC EHP4 to EHP8 upgrade phase PREP_INSTALL/SUBMOD_PREP_INSTALL/SHDINST_DB_PREP
entry.content:
We have the following issue during SAP EHP8 upgrade phase (SUM Tool).

EXECUTING /usr/sap/SUM/abap/exe/brconnect -u -c -f crown -o SAPSR3SHD -p <HIDDEN> -RDB
BR0801I BRCONNECT 7.40 (49)
BR0280I BRCONNECT time stamp: 2025-08-25 17:29:29
BR0262I Enter database user name[/password]:
BR1334E Owner SAPSR3SHD already exists in database
BR0182E Checking parameter/option '-o|-owner' failed
BR1336E Creating database owner SAPSR3SHD failed
BR0280I BRCONNECT time stamp: 2025-08-25 17:29:31
BR0804I BRCONNECT terminated with errors

Even tried SAP note 2813050 - BR1336E Creating database owner SAPSR3SHD failed

Kindly guide to resolve this issue.

entry.title: Unloading point and Recipient are not filled when Item category is D in Purchase requisition - ME51N
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

In transaction ME51N (Purchase Requisition), when I use account assignment category K together with item category D, the fields Unloading Point and Recipient on the Account Assignment tab cannot be filled. The values are entered but are automatically deleted.

If I remove item category D, then both fields can be maintained without any issue.
In ME21N (Purchase Order) this works fine.

I also checked the BAdI IF_EX_ME_PROCESS_REQ_CUST~FIELDSELECTION_ITEM, and I noticed that these two fields are set as mandatory there ( <fs>-fieldstatus = '+' ).

My questions:

Is it possible to have this functionality in Purchase Requisitions as well?

If yes, how can this be achieved – through SPRO customizing, or is it handled somewhere in the code?

Thanks in advance for any insights!

Best regards,

Nejla

entry.title: SAP HCM + Workday (2nd Compensation change doesnt reflect in SAP)
entry.content:
hi,

WD sends data to SAP thru IDOC.

If compensation data is changed on SAME DAY for 2 future dates, the 2nd compensation change doesnt reflect in SAP, it show the 1st compensation change only.

Neither the IDOC provides any info or error.

Please assist.

entry.title: Why Community moderator is not willing to moderate a spam? What is spam, what is not spam?
entry.content:
I consider that this post is clearly spam: फोनपे से पैसे काटने के बाद शिकायत कैसे दर्ज करें? - SAP Community.

Translation from Hindi: "How to file a complaint after money is deducted from XXXXXX ?" (see the meaning  of XXXXXX here: https://www.bing.com/search?q=translate+%E0%A4%AB%E0%A5%8B%E0%A4%A8%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AA%E0%A5%88%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%9F%E0%A4%A8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%AC%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%A6+%E0%A4%B6%E0%A4%BF%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%BE%E0%A4%AF%E0%A4%A4+%E0%A4%95%E0%A5%88%E0%A4%B8%E0%A5%87+%E0%A4%A6%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%8D%E0%A4%9C+%E0%A4%95%E0%A4%B0%E0%A5%87%E0%A4%82+into+English)

About XXXXXX: it is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card & debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline & online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds & buy insurance plans on XXXXXX.

After 3 alerts, the post still exists in the system.

I guess that the body of the post is confusing the moderator as it means nothing: "With you and your family the latest version for the attached file for your help in any of your help in any of your help in any of your help in the".

Why is this post not moderated?

Thank you.

Sandra

EDIT August 30th: 

Banner added at the top of Community:

"We’re aware of ongoing spam attacks on the platform. Our team is processing as quickly as we can. The best way to help us is to stop reporting, as we are already aware and reports create more work that slows us down. If you must report, please report the spammer’s profile not the individual pieces of content."

About "if you must report", I guess nobody "must" really report. The message should be clearer: right now, does it help to report the spammer's profile or not? As far as I understand, what currently applies is "stop reporting".

entry.title: SAP Community 2024 QA formatting "Increase Indent" doesn't work?
entry.content:
I have posted the question TIMEOUT dump (11 min.) for RFC in low priority (ru... - SAP Community and I used the button "Increase Indent" to align right some of the text:

During the edition of the question, it works well (paragraph "If no value is specified, the runtime is unlimited") as you can see:

But it's not considered after posting:

Is that a bug?

NB: the generated HTML code is "<p class="lia-indent-padding-left-60px">...</p>"; one workaround is to define "<blockquote>...</blockquote>" manually via the HTML button (credit: Re: The Unofficial SAP Community HTML Tags Documen... - SAP Community😞

Thanks.

Sandra

entry.title: Why no Delete options for Comments, Answers, Posts, Questions etc.
entry.content:
Hello Team,

My query is very evident from the subject.

Why we don't have 'Delete' options for Comments, Answers, Posts, Questions etc.

Mistakes do happen, and now in case I need to get something deleted I have to report my own content. 

Earlier there was a good simple Delete button available as an option.

Just a very simple example, in the below thread I wrongly added comment to the main post instead of posting the comment to another sub-comments thread. But there is no option to delete and now I have duplicate comments there.

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/unable-to-update-manually-added-standard-fields-to-standard-odata-apis/qaa-p/13610919#M4818912

Thanks,

Sijin

entry.title: My first message
Bug Report: "@space" disappears from code section when editing question or reply (Community 2024)
entry.content:
Just found a bug while discussing here: Passing a range in open sql select join condit... - SAP Community.

The author had typed this code containing "@space":

           ztable~rzzumskz <> @Space AND

But after clicking "Edit question" (or "Edit whatever"?), the question is displayed with "@space" removed (before posting), i.e.:

            ztable~rzzumskz <>  AND

I could experience the same bug with this current question.

There's no bug with the text "@space" outside the code section, it's kept.

Sandra

entry.title: RAP ABAP Runtime Error – CONVT_NO_NUMBER
entry.content:
Dear All,

While working in the RAP application, we are encountering the following ABAP runtime error: 'CONVERT_NO_NUMBER'.
This occurs when entering a value in the Attach ID field.

It appears the system is attempting to convert a non-numeric value into a numeric type, which is causing the issue. Kindly look into the data type handling or conversion logic in the relevant field or binding.

Your support in resolving this issue is appreciated.

 

 

but my field data type is char32. so please help.

entry.title: Incorrect Creation Time Displayed in Billing Document (VF01), Sales Document(VA01) Etc.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

We are facing an issue related to document creation time in our SAP system.

For example:

  • Today (03/10/2025) at 05:51 PM (local system time), I created a billing document.

  • After creation, when I display the billing document in VF03, the creation time shown is 12:28 PM instead of the actual time when the billing was created.

This issue is not limited to one user – it is happening for all clients in our system during sales order creation, delivery, and billing document creation.

Our business requirement is to capture and display the exact creation time of the document. Could you please advise:

  1. Why is there a mismatch between the actual creation time and the time displayed in VF03?

  2. Is this related to time zone settings (user profile/system/application server)?

  3. What is the recommended way to rectify this issue so that the correct creation time is displayed?

Any guidance or best practices to resolve this will be highly appreciated.

Thank you,
Tharmaraj S

entry.title: Calling All Aspiring SAP Consultants! 🚀 Linkedin Group
entry.content:
Are you starting your SAP journey or transitioning into SAP consulting? I've just launched a LinkedIn group specifically for professionals like us who are building their SAP careers.

Why you should Join:

  • Students preparing for SAP certifications
  • Career changers exploring SAP consulting
  • Recent graduates seeking their first SAP role
  • Anyone looking to connect with peers at a similar stage

What we'll share:

  • Study resources and certification tips
  • Job opportunities and career advice
  • Real-world project experiences
  • Networking and mentorship connections
  • Module-specific discussions (MM, SD, FICO, IS-H, and more)

Why join? Breaking into SAP can feel overwhelming—navigating certifications, choosing modules, finding opportunities. This group is a supportive space where we can learn together, share resources, and help each other succeed.

Join us here: ***REMOVED BY MODERATION

Whether you're just discovering SAP or actively building your consulting skills, let's connect and grow together!  

Feel free to share this with anyone who might benefit. See you in the group

#SAP #SAPConsultant #SAPCommunity #SAPCareers #SAPTraining #CareerDevelopment #SAPJourney

entry.title: MRP TYPE
entry.content:
Hi I am new to SAP, i have been looking at some Maintenance Item set up and there are items for example 

MRP Type ZB with Max 3 and ROP 1 but there is no LOT size and

MRP Type TB with Max 5 and ROP = 3 again no LOT SIZE

I have looked in a SAP Press book but there is no mention of ZB and TB can any one tell what they mean and should there be a LOT type I thought HB was used when ROP & Max are populated

entry.title: BM315 ISSUE
entry.content:
HELLO COMMUNITY SAP.

I HAVE An ISSUE IN TRANSACTION IP10 (SCHEDULE MAINTENANCE PLAN), WHEN RELEASE A MAINTENANCE ORDER AND RECORD, APPEAR ISSUE "BM315"

IN MY TASK LIST, DON´T USE ANY MATERIAL, ONLY USE WORK CENTER

THE "CUNI" TRANSACTION IS OKEY

THE MEASURE UNIT USED IS "H" IN ALL COMPONENTS, STRATEGY, TASK LIST, MEASURE POINT, ETC,
